entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
